content.question: The rover receives a signal at each point where the line tangent to its path has slope <math> <semantics> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>2</mn> </mfrac> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca aIXaaabaGaaGOmaaaaaaa@377D@</annotation> </semantics> </math>. At what times t, for <math> <semantics> <mtable columnalign="left"> <mtr> <mtd> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaaIWa GaeyizImQaamiDaiabgsMiJkaaikdaaeaaaaaa@3BD6@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, does the rover receive a signal?
